ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Subject: groups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I actually like it so far. the newbie area is pretty cool. lots of things to do and quests to do. there s an outdoor bank, merchants. all kinds of cool
ygData.messageBody:
> >The Nexus doesn't go to West Commonlands. It goes to
> >North Karana via the Antonica Scion. In which case
> *grin* Shows how much I go to Luclin. (worst expansion
> yet? in a word... YES.)
>
I actually like it so far. the newbie area is pretty cool. lots of things to
do and quests to do. there's an outdoor bank, merchants. all kinds of cool
stuff. and you don't have to worry about falling to your death like in
Kelethin.
I also like how berries just spawn on the ground for you to pickup. sure you
still have to buy drink but there's plenty of free food around.
>
> >you have to go through East Karana, Highpass,
> >and then West Commons. I think it's actually safer
> With a Camo and not travelling thru Kithicor at night
> it's not too bad a run, but pestering a druid for a
> camo and hoping it doesn't wear off is a hassle. The
> boat is probabl a better plan. The other option is
> shelling the ten plat to get a port from a Druid or
> Wizzy to WC. Much faster. :)
>
Or find a kind druid or wizzy who will do it for free or small donation.
luv,
-Su
